channel.title: Barrows. [pi]
channel.description: When i kill barrows they drop e.g dharoks helm 0. does anyone know how to add someone to fix barrows armour, or so when you get a drop you get the pieces 100%

item.title: Barrows. [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

No problem bro also feel free to PM me. i hope this code worked to you. and also its might be more easy to you:

if(player.getItems.playerHasItem(995, 100000)|| player.getItems.playerHasItem([b]BROKENID[/b], 1) ) {
c.deleteItem(995, 100000);
c.addItems([b]FIXEDID[/b], 1);
} else
c.sendMessage("You need 100K and a barrows piece to fix that!");

and also if you want to check if you have more broken pieces do this:
if(player.getItems.playerHasItem(995, 100000)|| player.getItems.playerHasItem(BROKENID, 1) || player.getItems.playerHasItem(BROKENID, 1) ) {
add more of the bold line.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows. [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Add a npc click and add this:

if(player.getItems.playerHasItem(995, 100000)|| player.getItems.playerHasItem(BARROWSID, 1) ) {
c.deleteItem(995, amount);
c.addItems(ID, amount);
} else
c.sendMessage("You need 100K and a barrows piece to fix that!");

Or something like this idk how to code a PI…

Read full topic

A npc that checks to see if you have any barrows 0 and then charges say 100k to fix each piece

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows. [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Do you want a command or a NPC that checks?
A command would be something along the lines of:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("fix") && (playerRights >= 0)) {
if player.getItems.playerHasItem(995, amount); {
c.removeItems(995, amount);
c.addItems(ID, amount);
} else
c.sendMessage("You need ##### to fix that!");
}

Read full topic
